title: indrajAla (kaNNigaL)
sahitya:
indrajAla viddaikkAran ulagamellAm ATTi vaikkum sUtradhAran iraivan 


caraNam 1    inbamuDan tunbam mAri mArik-kATTuvAn iruLum oLiyum shuzhalum veTTa veLiyaik-
kATTuvAn anburuvAi anbar manam tannil AduvAn anbar tunbam kaNDu porA ranga vibhO avan
   caraNam 2    kaLangamillA-taNNIr pOlak-kaNNukkut-tONum adil kAlai viTTAleDukka nammAl
 muDiyAdungANum iLamaiyil manam kavarum azhagu edilumuNDAmE aduvE elumbum tOlumAna pinbu
   caraNam 3    nalvar pOl nammai shuTrum koDiyavar uNDu nallavar palar paghaivar pOlak-kANbadum uNDu
 ellAm arangan aruL vilAsa nATaka mEDai edilum mayangAdavarkkup-pErinba vIDE aruLum
